channel.title: burnout on Miranda Zhang's Website
channel.description: Recent content in burnout on Miranda Zhang's Website

item.title: Realizing I just justified the past hour at a social as 'for impact,' but didn't realize it because I didn't literally think about impact (I was thinking, "you can help people!") Agh. But now I'm aware, next time I'll give greater weight to following what seems exciting and frivolous.
item.description:
context: As part of my burnout recovery, I’m avoiding using “impact” as a justification for my actions.

Realizing I just justified the past hour at a social as ‘for impact,’ but didn’t realize it because I didn’t literally think about impact (I was thinking, “you can help people!”) Agh. But now I’m aware, next time I’ll give greater weight to following what seems exciting and frivolous.

item.title: Some people's rest day look like writing personal reflections, gaining emotional insight, and/or brainstorming world-changing ideas.Mine is looking like a lot of HSMTMTS sing-alongs and in an effort to not judge myself for it, I'm going to just be really into this!
item.description:
Some people’s rest day look like writing personal reflections, gaining emotional insight, and/or brainstorming world-changing ideas.Mine is looking like a lot of HSMTMTS sing-alongs and in an effort to not judge myself for it, I’m going to just be really into this!

Apparently my resting state is singing really badly and not producing impact, and this is totally fine.
